translations.module.aimbot.description: Automatically faces selected entities around you.
translations.module.autoArmor.description: Automatically equips the best armor in your inventory.
translations.module.autoBow.description: Automatically shoots an arrow whenever your bow is fully loaded.
translations.module.autoClicker.description: Constantly clicks when holding down a mouse button.
translations.module.autoLeave.description: Automatically makes you leave the server whenever your health is low.
translations.module.autoRod.description: Auto use fishing rod to PVP.
translations.module.autoSoup.description: Makes you automatically eat soup whenever your health is low.
translations.module.autoWeapon.description: Automatically selects the best weapon in your hotbar.
translations.module.backtrack.description: Allows you to hit players by attacking their previous cached positions.
translations.module.bowAimbot.description: Automatically aims at players when using a bow.
translations.module.fastBow.description: Turns your bow into a machine gun.
translations.module.ignite.description: Automatically sets targets around you on fire.
translations.module.superKnockback.description: Increases knockback dealt to other entities.
translations.module.teleportHit.description: Allows to hit entities from far away.
